title: 24L09  Motorcycles, motor scooters, and motor bikes.
text:
Motorcycles, motor scooters, and motor
bikes are not considered automobiles, trailers, or trucks for purposes of Sec
13(b)(10).
html: Motorcycles, motor scooters, and motor bikes are not considered automobiles, trailers, or trucks for purposes of Sec 13(b)(10).
